name: The Climb (itch) (Niall Colvin)
description:
Submission For The Epic Mega Jam 2020 

This Interactive Experience has been designed to push the limits of a players patience and perseverance to overcome the obstacles in their way.

This Game has been Created By Steven.exe Using Unreal Engine 4.25.3

Credits-----------------------------

Steven.exe :

Harry Sofokloeous, Joe Hamilton and Niall Colvin : (Blueprinting) 

 Alexandru Constantanceu: (3D Assets)

Willhelm Scream - https://bigsoundbank.com/detail-0477-wilhelm-scream.html 

All other Assets, Artwork & Audio has been Created Internally
